title: Create test fixtures from BQ data
description:
Export sample ad data from BigQuery as JSON fixtures.

## Fixtures to create
- TL account sample (high-performing ads)
- TL TikTok waste example ($88k, 0 ROAS)
- WH account sample
- WH Floor Lamps waste example (₹55k, 0 ROAS)

## Location
tests/fixtures/
├── tl_sample_ads.json
├── wh_sample_ads.json
└── edge_cases.json

## Use in tests
```python
@pytest.fixture
def sample_ad_data():
    with open("tests/fixtures/tl_sample_ads.json") as f:
        return json.load(f)
```
